DataElement.preferredName: Patient Alcohol Consumption Behavior Concern Recommendation Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The determination of whether or not an incident has taken place where interest was expressed or advice was given by a medical health professional or any individual to reduce or modify existing activity connected with the drinking of beverages or other liquids containing ethanol or other alcohols as reported by a person receiving medical care or treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Alcohol Consumption Behavior Concern Recommendation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The event where interest was expressed or advice was given by a medical health professional or any individual to reduce or modify existing activity connected with the drinking of beverages or other liquids containing ethanol or other alcohols as reported by a person receiving medical care or treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:consumption of liquids containing ethanol; includes the behavior of drinking the alcohol.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
Consumption of liquids containing ethanol, including the behaviors associated with drinking the alcohol.

Property.preferredDefinition: human or animal activity studied in terms of motivation, direction, result, emotion, perception, or etiology.:A matter of interest or importance.:Advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.

Concepts.definition: The actions or reactions of an object or organism, usually in relation to the environment or surrounding world of stimuli.
A matter of interest or importance.
Advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the determination of whether a certain condition or situation exists or has taken place before the present time that is related to the drinking of beverages or other liquids containing ethanol or other alcohols.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

PermissibleValues.value: Yes, but not in the last year
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Yes, but not in the last year

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Yes, but not in the last year
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.::0: Before the present time.::2: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: consumption of liquids containing ethanol; includes the behavior of drinking the alcohol.:Before the present time.:Something that happens at a given place and time.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: Consumption of liquids containing ethanol, including the behaviors associated with drinking the alcohol.
Something that happens at a given place and time.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has a relative, friend, docto
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has a relative, friend, doctor or other health care worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?
